titleStmt.title: Certaine intelligence from Yorke. Concerning the meeting of that county, both for the militia and commission of aray, with severall passages on both sides, and their articles of agreement between both, for the present setling the peace in that county. Dated at Yorke September the last. Together with the taking of two ships at Newcastle by the Earle of Warwicke.
titleStmt.author: Ford, Philip, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
